tourBios.curYrHigh: Started his Mackenzie Tour season with a T13 finish at the PC Financial Open...Followed it up two events later with a T12 finish at the Syncrude Boreal Open.

tourBios.curYrHigh: Started his Mackenzie Tour season with a T13 finish at the PC Financial Open...Followed it up two events later with a T12 finish at the Syncrude Boreal Open.
tourBios.carHigh: 2014: First top-10 came at The Great Waterway Classic in eighth start of the campaign. Finished T4, with rounds of 71-64-66-69, three shots shy of winner David Bradshaw...One week later, posted rounds of 69-68-66-66 at the Wildfire Invitational to match Nate McCoy's 269 total and force a playoff. After matching scores for the first three playoff holes, made a bogey on fourth hole while McCoy converted a par to earn the win. With back-to-back top-10 finishes, jumped from 65th to 11th in the season-long Order of Merit. 2013: Earned an exemption into the second stage of PGA TOUR Q-School via his finish on the 2012 Order of Merit...Made two Sunshine Tour starts. Missed the cut at the Joburg Open...Came back with a T49 at the Dimension Data Pro-Am, thanks to a third-round 68.
tourBios.personal: Favorite course played is National GC of Canada...The course he would most like to play is Augusta National GC...Keeps a lucky penguin statue in his golf bag...Favorite professional teams are Denver Broncos, Toronto Maple Leafs, Toronto Raptors and Toronto Blue Jays...Favorite college team is Baylor...Favorite TV shows are "Dexter," "Breaking Bad" and "The Walking Dead."...Favorite book is Rich Dad, Poor Dad, and his favorite food is pizza... Enjoys watching Peyton Manning and Tiger Woods compete...Dream foursome would include his dad, Woods and Manning...Not many people know he was a hockey goalie for years and hoped to one day play in the NHL...favorite quote is "Take no days off."...Brother David has autism. Is involved with charitable work for autism.

tourBios.curYearHigh: Started his Mackenzie Tour season with a T13 finish at the PC Financial Open...Followed it up two events later with a T12 finish at the Syncrude Boreal Open.

dyn.dynResults: His best finish on the Mackenzie Tour-PGA T was 1st in 2012 at the ATB Financial Classic presented by TELUS.
dyn.dynStats: He ranks T36th in Scoring Average (Actual) on the Mackenzie Tour-PGA TOUR Canada.
